Jason Elam has remained close with prater, his replacement in denver. the broncos brought prater in to do kickoffs last december, and Jason Elam said he hoped prater would earn the full-time job after Jason Elam decided to leave. the two exchange text messages and Jason Elam still offers prater advice from time to time. prater has made 16-of-19 kicks this year, including five of 50 yards or longer and has boomed 17 kickoffs for touchbacks, the most in the nfl. i couldn't think of a better guy, a more talented guy, to come in and take a shot at it, " Jason Elam said of prater." he's done a great job. u.s. from mexico, pe?a crosses metaphorical borders. some are obvious- the border between poverty and wealth, between tacos and sandwiches, between the cotton fields and the place" where the ox does not plow. <q> but many are less obvious. in one scene, pe?a stands at a classroom window, looking down at a chicano rally. a classmate dismisses them as <NO_QUOTATION> </q> what would she think, "pe?a wonders," if i told her,' i know why they're demonstrating. i've slaved in your farmers' orchards and vineyards.' she could never understand.
